revised_title: Arthur Fage: A Pioneering Career in Aeronautics and Fluid Mechanics
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Arthur Fage, a prominent figure in aeronautics and fluid mechanics who spent his entire professional life at the National Physical Laboratory. Fage worked on various problems related to aerodynamics and fluid mechanics, contributing to the development of the field alongside other notable scientists like Bairstow, Relf, and Melvill Jones. His work in the field of aeronautics led to significant advancements in the understanding of airflow and the design of aircraft structures.
